title: The Importance of Water
content: - Water is essential for all life on Earth.
It makes up about 60% of the human body.

Water is involved in many important bodily functions, including:
    - Regulating body temperature
    - Transporting nutrients and oxygen
    - Flushing out waste products
image_desc: A clear glass of water with condensation on the outside
narration: Water is essential for life. It makes up a large portion of our bodies and is involved in many important functions.
